titleStmt.title: Constance of Cleveland a very excellent sonnet of the most faire Lady Constance of Cleveland, and her disloyall knight : to the tune of Crimson velvet.

notesStmt.note: First line reads: Ìt was a youthfull Knight'.
Imperfect: faded, tightly bound, with loss of text.
Reproduction of original in: Pepys Library.
